name: A Solidsphere Tale: Sky Crumbs
description:
Sky Crumbs is a first person platformer set in the Solidsphere Universe with a little twist : you can create your own floating platforms.

You play as a man living on the sky, looking for someone down below.

Features:

  • Jump down from your hole in the sky.
  • Collect pieces of sky to use them as platforms to get around the different locals of Solidsphere.
  • Talk to a large cast of two characters!
  • 7 collectibles to find by interacting with notes and two of them unlock some goodies! One note will reveal itself on one condition...
  • There are two main endings, if you play the game twice; plus one secret ending.
